# [Interview #67: AOL Chat 1, Entry #43](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=67#43)

#### Dragon9150

What happens to Birgitte if the Horn of Valere is sounded again?

#### Robert Jordan

Read and find out, my children, read and find out. :)
